DOC.brief_title: Effect Commonly Used Antibiotic , Doxycycline , Women With Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) one lead cause female infertility , affect 5-10 % reproductive-age woman . This heterogeneous disorder characterize anovulatory infertility , androgen excess , increase ratio LH FSH , morphologic polycystic change ovary . Obesity insulin resistance also metabolic factor associate PCOS increase morbidity patient . Inducing fertility patient PCOS challenge , often involve ovulation induction lead ovarian enlargement , hyperstimulation , multiple-birth pregnancy . This study design determine novel effective strategy promote normal cycling patient population .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women 18 40 year age . 2 . History PCOS < 8 period proceed year 3 . Clinical biochemical evidence androgen excess 4 . BMI < 40 5 . Willingness sign consent study include participation collection blood specimens 6 . Willingness discontinue OCP duration study period 36 week 1 . Pregnancy 2 . Hypersensitivity doxycycline tetracycline 3 . History Cushing 's syndrome 4 . History hyperprolactinemia 5 . History congenital adrenal hyperplasia 6 . Significant hepatic impairment , include serum AST ALT > 1.5 time upper limit normal . 7 . Significant renal impairment , GFR < 60 ml/min 8 . Current use metformin , statin , glucocorticoid , spironolactone and/or antiestrogens .
